III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
The administrative office of this agency is a remodeled two-story house located in
Millington, MI. The agency currently provides outpatient based counseling services at
this facility. There is an adequate amount of space to provide the child placing agency
services requested. Office space, clerical, filing and communication resources are
adequate to meet the needs of child placing activities. The resources are also adequate
to provide the social work and counseling services identified in the program statements.
B. Program Description
This agency has applied for authorization to certify foster homes for licensure, receive
children for placement in licensed foster homes, supervise independent living
placements, evaluate applicants for adoption, and place and supervise children with
adoptive parents. Program statements for each of these activities have been
developed, reviewed and approved at this time. It is expected that appropriate policies
and procedures will be implemented consistent with the approved program statements
and applicable licensing rules.
The Executive Director attended the required foster home certification training in
September 2007 and is scheduled to attend the foster home complaint training on
12/11-12/2007.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
There are no rule violations identified at this time.
